div.p:
stablished in 1985, HDL is a global company that manufactures customised building automation products, and professional stage lighting equipment. Having a truly worldwide presence, HDL offices can be found in over 100 countries.
The solutions provided by HDL fall into four distinct categories: HDL Buspro Home/Building automation system HDL KNX/EIB Bus series HDL Wireless HDL Architectural/Theatre Lighting Control system Our products and solutions promote energy-savings, centralised control, comfort, convenience, added security to customers across the globe.
